abstract: Amid market turmoil, Chow Tai Fook Jewellery, based in Hong Kong, is set to stage one of the largest initial public offerings in the world this year, with a listing that could raise more than $3 billion next month.
snippet: Amid market turmoil, Chow Tai Fook Jewellery, based in Hong Kong, is set to stage one of the largest initial public offerings in the world this year, with a listing that could raise more than $3 billion next month.

headline.main: Hong Kong Jeweler Plans $3 Billion I.P.O.
